data.eml:eml: Three new false spider mites of the genus Pseudoleptus Bruyant (Acari: Tenuipalpidae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khanjani, Masoumeh, Khanjani, Mohammad, Saboori, Alireza, Seeman, Owen D. (2012): Three new false spider mites of the genus Pseudoleptus Bruyant (Acari: Tenuipalpidae) from Iran. Zootaxa 3297: 41-56, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280892
